title: UConn returns to Final Four behind Bueckers' 31
content: Behind 31 points and six assists, Paige Bueckers lifted No. 2 seed UConn to a 78-64 win over No. 1 seed USC in the Spokane 4 regional final, clinching the team's 16th Final Four appearance in 17 years and 24th overall.

title: With torpedo bat, De La Cruz has 7 RBIs for Reds
content: Using a torpedo bat, Elly De La Cruz had a single, double and two home runs with seven RBIs, as the Cincinnati Reds routed the Texas Rangers 14-3 on Monday night, and after the win, manager Terry Francona said, "I think it's more the player than the bat."

title: Sources: Miles to forgo WNBA draft, enter portal
content: After her team's exit in the Sweet 16 on Saturday, Notre Dame guard Olivia Miles has decided to forgo the WNBA draft, despite being projected as the No. 2 overall selection, and enter the transfer portal, sources told ESPN's Shams Charania on Monday.

title: Sources: Red Sox LHP Crochet gets $170M deal
content: Left-hander Garrett Crochet and the Red Sox are in agreement on a six-year, $170 million contract extension, sources told ESPN, keeping the 25-year-old ace with the organization that traded for him this winter to lead its rotation.

title: Braves' Profar gets 80-game ban for PED violation
content: Atlanta Braves outfielder Jurickson Profar was suspended for 80 games by Major League Baseball on Monday after a positive test for the performance-enhancing drug chorionic gonadotropin.

title: Texas finally aces Elite 8 test as familiar foe looms
content: No. 1 seed Texas wore down No. 2 TCU 58-47 in the Elite Eight on Monday night and now heads to the women's Final Four for the first time since 2003.

title: Kelly 1st to hit for March cycle, ends Cubs' drought
content: In a convincing 18-3 victory over the Athletics on Monday, catcher Carson Kelly became the first Cubs player in 32 years to hit for the cycle, ending the longest drought by any team in the National League. He's also the first player with a cycle in March.

title: Carbon monoxide probed in Gardner son's death
content: The death of Miller Gardner, the son of former Yankees outfielder Brett Gardner, is being investigated as related to possible carbon monoxide poisoning.

title: Women's Final Four predictions: A unanimous favorite and a split decision
content: No. 1 seeds UCLA, South Carolina and Texas are bound for Tampa, as well as 2-seed UConn. Who will reach the title game?

title: Reranking the women's Final Four: First look at the national semifinals
content: No. 1 seeds UCLA, South Carolina and Texas advanced to the Final Four. But 2-seed UConn tops our list.

title: Two weeks left in the NBA season! Answering the biggest questions
content: Our NBA insiders break down six things to keep your eye on in the last two weeks of the NBA regular season.

title: An MIT-educated professor, the New York Yankees and the bat that could be changing baseball
content: After the Yankees' home run barrage with bats that look like bowling pins, the innovation is sweeping baseball.

title: After Olympics controversy, Jordan Chiles is 'That Girl' leading UCLA to NCAAs
content: Chiles always knew she could help the Bruins win an NCAA title, but she didn't know how much they would help her heal.

title: Our annual mock draft with 32 first-round trades: Deals for Kirk Cousins, Micah Parsons
content: We proposed 32 trades to shake up Round 1, including deals that involve Falcons QB Kirk Cousins and Cowboys edge Micah Parsons.

title: Men's Final Four predictions, previews for Auburn-Florida, Duke-Houston
content: Here's how each 1-seed reached San Antonio and their key to reaching the final, plus disagreement on one game.

title: Haaland's nightmare game, Napoli back in Serie A title race, RB Leipzig chaos, more
content: It was an FA Cup weekend to forget for Erling Haaland, but Man City still booked their place in the semifinal. ALSO: Napoli's win over Milan has them back in the title race, as Gab Marcotti recaps the weekend.

title: Women's team sale pads £128.4m Chelsea profit
content: Chelsea recorded a pre-tax profit before taxation of 128.4 million pounds ($165.83 million) for the year ending in June despite a fall in revenue thanks to the repositioning of their women's team, the Premier League club said on Monday.

title: Isco on Antony: We need to crowdfund for him
content: Real Betis midfielder Isco has joked that crowdfunding will be needed to keep Manchester United's loanee Antony at the club for at least next season.

title: City hopeful injury won't end Haaland's season
content: Erling Haaland is set for a spell on the sideline with an ankle injury picked up against Bournemouth on Sunday, but Manchester City remain hopeful the striker will be able to play again this season and take part in the FIFA Club World Cup this summer.

title: Wrexham revenue up 155% amid promotion push
content: Wrexham reported record financial results for their first year back in the EFL in the latest chapter of the club's success story.

title: Davidson out of USWNT squad with knee injury
content: Defender Tierna Davidson will miss the United States women's national team's upcoming pair of games against Brazil due to a knee injury, U.S. Soccer announced on Monday.

title: Sporting KC, Vermes part ways after 16 years
content: Sporting Kansas City have have parted ways with manager Peter Vermes the Major League Soccer club announced on Monday.

title: Arsenal and Spurs to play first NLD overseas
content: Tottenham Hotspur and Arsenal will face off in Hong Kong in July for what will be the first north London derby to take place outside of the UK.

title: Arteta positive over Saka return, reveals workload
content: Arsenal's Bukayo Saka has impressed in a behind-closed-doors friendly and taken part in six straight training sessions, manager Mikel Arteta has revealed.

title: Justine Siegal will go to bat for women in pro baseball once more as WPBL co-founder
content: As part of Women's History Month, ESPN examines WPBL co-founder Justine Siegal's lifelong dedication to women's baseball.

title: MLS: Messi's Miami on top, Sporting KC rock bottom
content: A 35-minute cameo from Leo Messi was all Inter Miami needed to show why they are clear atop ESPN's MLS Power Rankings. Sporting KC's season, meanwhile, went from bad to worse.

title: NWSL: Orlando stays top, Angel City on the up
content: Orlando is still top of ESPN's NWSL Power Rankings, but Angel City is beginning to look like a contender.

title: Letting Salah leave for free could be one of Liverpool's biggest mistakes ever
content: Every time Mohamed Salah scores, he gets closer to Erling Haaland's record, and Liverpool's failure to hand him a new contract looks even more reckless.

title: Breaking down the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game
content: Everything you need to know about the 2025 McDonald's All American girls' game on Tuesday (6:30 p.m. ET, ESPN2).

title: Can U.S. figure skating carry this momentum to the Olympics?
content: With less than a year until the Olympics, the world titles from Ilia Malinin, Alysa Liu and Madison Chock and Evan Bates have even more weight.

title: 'The Big Match': Arsenal FC to host club-themed dating show
content: The club is calling for single supporters based out of the United Kingdom and over the age of 18 to apply to be a participant in the show.

title: Forecasting next season for women's eliminated top seeds
content: NC State has been eliminated. From portal priorities to incoming recruits, we look ahead to the Wolfpack next season.

title: Sensex ends over 1,300 points down: Top reasons for bear attack
content: Stock market crash today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, tanked in trade on Tuesday. While BSE Sensex plunged below 76,000 intraday, Nifty50 went below 23,150.

title: China, India should strengthen ties in 'Dragon-Elephant tango': Xi Jinping
content: China and India celebrated the 75th anniversary of their diplomatic relations with mutual congratulatory messages from their leaders. They emphasized strengthening cooperation, strategic trust, and maintaining border peace, guided by the direction from their previous summit meeting in Kazan, Russia.

title: 'Gareebon ko bhi rehne de': Virender Sehwag mocks RCB
content: Royal Challengers Bengaluru have made an impressive start to their IPL 2025 season with victories over Kolkata Knight Riders and Chennai Super Kings. Despite their success, former India opener Virender Sehwag humorously mocked RCB, referencing their lack of an IPL title. RCB’s next challenge will be against Gujarat Titans on Wednesday.

title: Supreme Court refuses to release Ranveer Allahbadia's passport
content: The Supreme Court refused to release YouTuber Ranveer Allahbadia's passport following a complaint regarding his controversial remarks during an 'India's Got Latent' episode. Despite apologizing, he faces multiple FIRs. The court extended his protection from arrest while allowing him to resume his podcasting with certain conditions.

title: SBI outage: Users report facing issues with mobile banking, fund transfers
content: State Bank of India (SBI) services are currently experiencing downtime, impacting mobile banking, ATM withdrawals, and fund transfers. The disruption, which began around 8:15 am, is attributed to annual closing activities scheduled between 1:00 pm and 4:00 pm today. SBI advises using UPI Lite and ATM channels during this period. NPCI also notes potential intermittent transaction declines.

title: 'I am a Yogi, politics not full-time job for me': UP CM on PM aspirations
content: Uttar Pradesh chief minister Yogi Adityanath addressed speculation about his prime ministerial ambitions, emphasizing his commitment to serving Uttar Pradesh and rejecting any discord with BJP's central leadership. He defended the government's bulldozer action and the ban on offering namaz on public roads, calling for discipline during public events and religious gatherings.

title: 'Sikandar' box office collection: Salman Khan starrer might drop after Eid
content: Salman Khan's film 'Sikandar' opened to Rs 26 crore at the domestic box office, which was lower compared to his previous releases. Despite seeing a slight increase with Rs 29 crore on the Eid holiday, the film's performance has been underwhelming in certain regions.

title: Microsoft CEO to employees in Town Hall: Best thing about China's Deepseek is ...
content: Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella praised Chinese AI company DeepSeek for its innovative AI computing architecture, highlighting its success with a team of just 200 people. DeepSeek's transformation of a research project into a top App Store product sets a new standard for Microsoft's AI efforts, emphasizing the importance of collaboration and rapid innovation.

title: 11 income tax changes from April 1: Top points
content: Income Tax Changes FY 2025-26: Starting April 1, 2025, several new income tax regulations are coming into effect for FY 2025-26, bringing changes to tax slabs, exemptions, TDS/TCS rules, and NPS contributions. The modifications aim at simplifying tax processes, enhancing benefits for taxpayers, and offering more clarity on exemptions and deductions.

title: USCIS: Annual quota of 85K for H-1B cap visas for fiscal 2026 has been met
content: USCIS has announced that the H-1B cap of 85,000 for FY 2026 has been filled, and the lottery selection process is complete. Sponsoring employers can view selection results in their registration accounts, with applications to start on April 1, 2025.

title: 'Shocks our conscience': SC slams UP govt over 'illegal' demolition of houses
content: The Supreme Court condemned Uttar Pradesh and Prayagraj authorities for illegally demolishing houses without due process, violating residents' Article 21 rights. It ordered Rs 10 lakh compensation for affected owners. The demolitions were reportedly based on mistaken assumptions about the land's ownership.

title: Elon Musk slams Netflix series Adolescence, co-writer replies
content: Elon Musk responded to allegations of 'anti-white propaganda' in Netflix's Adolescence series. The claims, regarding race-swapped characters and a misleading narrative, were debunked by co-writer Jack Thorne, emphasizing the show is not based on a true story and focuses on issues of masculinity.

title: 'Don't drop Ashwin, but stop him from bowling': Batting legend to CSK
content: Chennai Super Kings, with one win and three losses, face challenges in their IPL 2025 campaign. Kris Srikkanth suggests replacing Jamie Overton with Devon Conway and using R Ashwin more effectively outside the Powerplay. CSK are preparing for their next match against Delhi Capitals. Five-time IPL champions CSK are set to face Delhi Capitals in their next fixture on Saturday.

title: Virat Kohli to play in Big Bash: Is it true?
content: Indian cricket fans were shocked when Sydney Sixers announced Virat Kohli's BBL signing, which was later revealed as an April Fool’s prank. Kohli, focused on IPL 2025, became the highest run-scorer against CSK. During the IPL opener, he was honored with the prestigious 'IPL 18' memento for his record-breaking achievements in the tournament.

title: At least 18 dead as blaze engulfs firecracker godown in Gujarat
content: A massive fire at a firecracker storage godown near Deesa town in Banaskantha district claimed at least 17 lives, with several others injured, many suffering severe burns. The fire caused the building to collapse. Emergency teams are working to retrieve bodies, and the injured are being treated at Deesa government hospital.

title: Noida Lamborghini crash: Was it speeding at 300km/hour? Here's what accused driver said
content: A speeding Lamborghini Huracan driven by car dealer Deepak Kumar veered onto a pavement in Noida Sector 94, injuring two construction workers. Distracted by an error message on the car's display, Kumar lost control of the vehicle. The car's owner, Mridul Tiwari, was not present during the incident.

title: Karnataka 1st PUC results 2025 declared: Check your scorecard online here
content: The Karnataka School Examination and Assessment Board (KSEAB) has declared the Karnataka 1st PUC Results 2025, offering relief to thousands of students. The exams, held from February 13 to February 28, were evaluated efficiently and results were made available online on March 31. Students can access their scorecards through official websites. Those dissatisfied with their results can apply for revaluation, and supplementary exams are scheduled for June 2025. The process marks a shift from previous years as results are not centralized.

title: Delhi riot case: Court allows lodging of FIR against Kapil Mishra
content: A Delhi court found a cognizable offence against Delhi law minister Kapil Mishra in connection with the 2020 North East Delhi riots, ordering further investigation. The order came following an application by Mohammad Ilyas, leading to an FIR registration. Mishra's presence in Kardam Puri was highlighted.

title: 'Garbage for nation': Karnataka govt faces flak over waste collection fee
content: Union Minister Pralhad Joshi criticizes the Karnataka government for imposing a garbage cess in Bengaluru. BJP leaders claim the Congress-led government is taxing everything due to financial mismanagement. Protests are planned against the price hikes in essentials like milk, electricity, and now waste management fees. The new garbage tax is set to burden residents and businesses from April 1.

title: Watch: Gas pipeline explosion in Malaysia sparks massive fire, over 100 injured
content: An explosion from a ruptured gas pipeline near Kuala Lumpur ignited numerous residences, affecting over 100 individuals during Eid. The fire, visible for hours, damaged 49 houses and hospitalized 63 people. Selangor's Chief Minister confirmed evacuations, with temporary housing in mosques. Emergency services isolated the pipeline and initiated investigations.

title: 'India to drop tariffs substantially': Trump ahead of 'Liberation Day' deadline
content: US President Trump declared that India and other US allies would soon substantially decrease their tariffs. This announcement follows his decision to implement a uniform global tariff. The move is expected to benefit US trade, correcting the current high tariffs imposed on American goods, with countries like India and the EU already showing signs of compliance.

title: ‘Yeshu Yeshu prophet' Bajinder Singh sentenced to life in 2018 rape case
content: A Punjab court has sentenced Bajinder Singh, a self-proclaimed pastor, to life imprisonment for a 2018 rape case. Convicted recently, Singh faced additional accusations from two more women following his conviction. The Akal Takht secretariat condemned the delay in police action and assured full support for the victims, urging them to trust in justice.

title: Aniket Verma's journey: Uncle's sacrifices, and Pandya's Maggi story
content: Sunrisers Hyderabad's new recruit, Aniket Verma, has hit 12 sixes in just 56 balls, capturing everyone's attention. His inspirational journey highlights the magic of the IPL

title: 'Uttarakhand ka naam bhi UP-2 kar dijiye': Akhilesh on CM Dhami renaming 11 places
content: Samajwadi Party chief Akhilesh Yadav criticized Uttarakhand CM Pushkar Singh Dhami's announcement to rename 11 places across four districts. Dhami justified the renaming as honoring Indian culture and great personalities. The changes include names in Haridwar, Dehradun, Nainital, and Udham Singh Nagar. The Tapkeshwar Mahadev Temple's Acharya Dr. Vipin Joshi praised the move as aligning with Sanatan culture.

title: Ashwani Kumar: From forgotten name to record-setter on IPL debut
content: Ashwani Kumar made an impressive debut in the IPL, taking four wickets in his spell against Kolkata Knight Riders, including dismissing their captain and the powerful Andre Russell. He is now the first Indian bowler to achieve such a feat on IPL debut, playing a crucial role in his team's victory.

title: 2 loco pilots dead, 4 injured as goods trains collide head-on in Jharkhand
content: Two goods trains operated by NTPC collided in Jharkhand's Sahebganj district, resulting in the deaths of both drivers and injuring four others. The incident occurred on NTPC-owned tracks used for coal transportation, linking their power plants in Bihar and West Bengal. The collision happened near Bhognadih in the Barhait police station area around 3 am.

title: Supercars go rouge: From Lamborghinis to Porsches, when luxury turns dangerous
content: A Lamborghini crash in Noida highlights the issue of reckless driving of luxury cars in India. The driver, Deepak Kumar, was arrested but later released on bail. Similar incidents in Nagpur, Mumbai, Pune, and Ahmedabad involving high-end cars driven recklessly have resulted in fatalities and serious injuries, raising concerns about road safety and accountability.

title: 'Need, not an achievement': UP CM Yogi Adityanath on bulldozer action
content: Uttar Pradesh chief minister Yogi Adityanath said that the 'bulldozer model' used by his government is a necessity rather than an achievement. He justified its use for both infrastructure development and removing illegal structures. Earlier, Adityanath emphasised that law and order are upheld through these actions, and opponents must be dealt with in a language they understand to maintain justice.

title: Chandigarh cop suspended after wife ‘stopped traffic’ to make reel
content: Chandigarh Police have suspended constable Ajay Kundu after his wife Jyoti disrupted traffic to film a dance video. The viral video, captured on March 20, showed Jyoti performing at a busy intersection while her sister-in-law filmed her. Jyoti was charged with obstructing traffic and endangering public safety, though she claimed the video was shot during a red signal.

title: How to calculate income tax with latest tax slabs
content: New Income Tax Slabs FY 2025-26: Starting April 1, 2025, individuals opting for the new income tax regime won't pay taxes on taxable income up to Rs 12 lakh. The revised income tax slabs for FY 2025-26 impose differentiated rates for varied income ranges with detailed tax liability calculations for incomes exceeding Rs 12 lakh.

title: Passports revoked, rumours swirl about treason charges against top RPP leaders in Nepal
content: RPP senior vice-president Mishra and general secretary Rana, a member of the lower house, were remanded in custody for five days by Kathmandu district court judge Taradevi Maharjan.

title: CBSE revises Class 10 & 12 syllabus for 2025-26: Check key details here
content: CBSE has introduced major changes in the syllabus for the 2025-26 academic session, focusing on dynamic, student-centered learning. The updated curriculum emphasizes innovative teaching methods, including project-based and inquiry-driven learning, along with technology integration. It also revamps assessments to prioritize competency over rote memorization, aiming to equip students with critical thinking skills for real-world challenges and future careers.

title: '100% tariffs from India': White House lists tariffs imposed on US goods
content: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt highlighted high tariffs imposed by countries like India, Japan, and Canada on US goods, making exports challenging. She stressed the need for reciprocity to ensure fair treatment for American products. President Trump is set to announce significant, reciprocal tariffs soon, aimed at creating a level playing field for the United States.

title: 'Learn discipline from Hindus': UP CM Yogi backs ban on namaz on roads
content: Uttar Pradesh chief minister Yogi Adityanath justified the ban on offering namaz on public roads, citing the Maha Kumbh's orderly conduct as a model. He emphasized the importance of discipline, noting that 66 crore devotees attended the Maha Kumbh without any incidents. This follows Meerut police's directive to restrict Eid namaz to designated areas, with heightened security measures in place.

title: 'Offensive': Assam CM's slams Bangladesh's Yunus' NE ‘landlocked’ remark
content: Assam CM Himanta Biswa Sarma condemned Bangladesh advisor Muhammad Yunus's claim of Bangladesh being the 'guardian' of the Indian Ocean for India's northeastern states. Yunus suggested Bangladesh as a key gateway for the region, inviting China to expand its presence.

title: WATCH: Rohit Sharma has intense discussion with Nita Ambani
content: Rohit Sharma and Nita Ambani were seen having a serious discussion after Mumbai Indians' win over Kolkata Knight Riders, where Rohit continued his poor form, scoring only 13 runs. Despite Sharma's struggles, MI secured an easy victory thanks to notable performances from Ashwani Kumar and Ryan Rickelton, who played a crucial role in the run chase.

title: Watch: SpaceX launches first human spaceflight over Earth's polar regions
content: SpaceX launched the Fram2 mission, the first human spaceflight over Earth's polar regions, carrying four astronauts including commander Jannicke Mikkelsen and entrepreneur Chun Wang. The mission, launched from NASA's Kennedy Space Center, aims to advance research for future Mars travel and involves various scientific experiments, including space X-ray imaging and microgravity mushroom cultivation.

title: What is the 7- minute power workout everyone's talking about?
content: The 7-minute workout, created by exercise physiologist Chris Jordan, is a high-intensity circuit training (HICT) routine, featuring 12 exercises performed consecutively. Each exercise lasts for 30 seconds with a 10-second break in between. This workout is suitable for all fitness levels and aims to improve both muscular strength and cardiovascular endurance, making it an attractive option for busy individuals.

title: What does India look like from space? Sunita Williams answers
content: Astronaut Sunita Williams described her view of India from space during her nine-month stay on the International Space Station. She highlighted the Himalayas' ripple effect, the fishing fleets near Mumbai and Gujarat, and the network of lights visible across the country. Williams expressed excitement about visiting her ancestral home in Gujarat.

title: European soccer review: Barcelona extend unbeaten run to 20
content: barcelona remain unbeaten in 2025 after 20 games without recording a loss this year under Hansi Flick . real madrid are now two games away from winning the oldest competition in the world . marco rose is out of a job at RB Leipzig with Zsolt Lw coming in .

title: Transfer rumors, news: Arsenal eyeing summer move for Leroy Sané
content: arsena l are "seriously interested" in signing leroy Sané on a free transfer . the german international is yet to receive an official contract offer despite entering the final few months of his deal . his performances have been recognized by the club's hierarchy .

title: Can Arsenal, Man United make a WSL title race after Chelsea stumble?
content: arsenal beat real madrid 2-1 in the women's champions league . a second-half brace from Ana Azkona handed athletic club a win over deportivo La Corua after fellow basque side Eibar had triumphed over Levante .

title: College baseball Week 7: Top 25 rankings, SEC curfew and what to watch
content: Coastal Carolina, Kansas State and Arizona State are the newcomers to this week's rankings and take the spots of Wake Forest, Stanford and Arias . the rest of the top five mostly looks the same as last week, but Texas has rose to the no. 5 spot as Oregon State dropped completely to no. 11 .

title: Fantasy baseball buzz: Braves' Profar to miss 80 games, lineup moves to make
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . the team broke less than 24 hours after his former team, the San Diego Padres, swept them in their opening four-game series . Profar was suspended for 80 games for violating the PED policy .

title: BJP Likely To Get New President By April-End: Sources
content: The election process for the BJP president will begin as soon as the Parliament session ends, sources have said.

title: 'Might As Well Split Bangladesh...': Northeast Leaders Slam Dhaka Remark
content: The remarks by Muhammad Yunus, the Bangladesh interim government's chief advisor, on the Northeastern states have drawn sharp reactions in India. Assam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has described the remarks as "offensive"

title: Bengaluru Teacher Arrested For Extortion After Affair With Student's Father
content: A Bengaluru teacher has been arrested on charges of blackmail and extorting money from a student's parent with whom she had been having an affair.

title: 'Everyone Disturbed': Why Court Mentioned Video Of Girl Running With Books
content: The viral video of a girl holding her books close and running away as a bulldozer razes shanties came up in the Supreme Court today as the bench blasted Uttar Pradesh government and the Prayagraj administration, pulling them for a demolition drive

title: "Shocks Our Conscience": Supreme Court Blasts Prayagraj Bulldozer Action
content: Coming down heavily on the Uttar Pradesh government and the Prayagraj administration for bulldozer action in the city, the Supreme Court has said the demolition drive was "unconstitutional" and "inhuman".

title: 'Yeshu Yeshu Prophet' Bajinder Singh Gets Life Term In 2018 Rape Case
content: Self-styled preacher Pastor Bajinder Singh has been sentenced to life imprisonment in connection with a 2018 rape case by a court in Punjab's Mohali.

title: 100% Tariffs From India, 50% From EU: What White House Said On Trump's Plans
content: Amid suspense over US President Donald Trump's "Liberation Day tariff" plans, White House spokesperson Karoline Leavitt confirmed on Monday that there won't be any exemptions on reciprocal tariffs.

title: Ratan Tata's Rs 3,800 Crore Estate: Who Gets What, Key Details Revealed
content: Late industrialist Ratan Tata's estate, estimated to be worth around Rs 3,800 crore, will primarily benefit the Ratan Tata Endowment Foundation and the Ratan Tata Endowment Trust.

title: Dagger To Chicken's Neck? Why Bangladesh Leader's Remarks Enraged India
content: Bangladesh leader Muhammad Yunus' remarks on the landlocked nature of India's Northeastern states and the sharp response from the region's leaders have again put the vital Chicken's Neck corridor under the spotlight.

title: Ishan Kishan Out Of BCCI Central Contracts, This Trio To Earn Maiden Entry
content: All-rounder Axar Patel, who played a vital role in India's unbeaten runs in the T20 World Cup and Champions Trophy, also stands a good chance to earn a promotion.

title: "To Be Arrested Tomorrrow": Musk After 4 Lakh Social Security Numbers Stolen
content: An individual will be arrested soon for allegedly stealing and selling the personal information of four lakh people from the Social Security database, Elon Musk has said.

title: Liquor, Meat, Sugar: Indian Sectors To Be Worst Hit By Trump's Tariffs
content: US President Donald Trump will unveil a new tariff plan on April 2, which he has dubbed "Liberation Day".

title: State Bank Of India Internet Banking Services Hit By Technical Issues
content: SBI mobile banking services experienced disruptions for the second time in March due to technical issues.

title: Borrowed Rs 30 For Auto, Rejected By KKR, CSK: MI Pacer Sets IPL On Fire
content: Ashwani Kumar scripted history for Mumbai Indians by taking 4 wickets on his IPL debut against Kolkata Knight Riders.

title: Video: Chandigarh Cop Suspended After Wife's Dance Reel Obstructs Traffic
content: The video, which has gone viral, shows Jyoti dancing to a popular Haryanvi song, oblivious to the traffic jam she is causing.

title: Pay More For Road Journeys, Toll Charges At National Highways Hiked
content: Commuters on national highways and expressways will need to pay more for their road journeys, as the National Highways Authority of India (NHAI) has increased toll charges by an average of 4 to 5 per cent on highway sections across the country.

title: Dagger To Chicken's Neck? Why Bangladesh Leader's Remarks Enraged India
content: Bangladesh leader Muhammad Yunus' remarks on the landlocked nature of India's Northeastern states and the sharp response from the region's leaders have again put the vital Chicken's Neck corridor under the spotlight.

title: ED accuses TASMAC of creating hurdles in investigation into money laundering charges
content: Files a detailed counter affidavit before Madras High Court denying charges of human rights violations during search and seizure operation at TASMAC headquarters

title: Will maintain decency in shows: Podcaster Ranveer Allahbadia to Supreme Court
content: The Bench said it would consider Ranveer Allahbadia’s prayer for releasing the passport two weeks later

title: India, China leaders exchange congratulatory messages on 75th anniversary of diplomatic relations
content: President Xi Jinping and his Indian counterpart Droupadi Murmu besides Chinese Premier Li Qiang and Prime Minister Narendra Modi exchanged congratulatory messages respectively

title: Toll charges hiked by 4-5% across India: NHAI
content: The change in toll fee is part of an annual exercise to revise the rates that are linked to the changes in the wholesale price index-based inflation

title: Mohanlal-starrer L2: Empuraan gets 24 ‘voluntary cuts’ totalling 2.08 minutes after right-wing backlash
content: A re-edited version of ‘L2: Empuraan’, certified by the regional officer of the Central Board of Film Certification, is likely to appear in most theatres in India only by April 2

title: 32 years after Mumbai serial blasts, court orders release of Tiger Memon's properties to Centre
content: 14 properties linked to 1993 Mumbai bomb blasts mastermind Tiger Memon to be handed over to central government

title: Foreign national sexually assaulted by man who offered her lift in Hyderabad
content: The accused, who was driving a hired car, was already with five others when he spotted the two foreigners

title: Union HRD Minister’s intervention sought in Kancha Gachibowli land auction; Laxman raises issue in RS
content: BJP vows to go to any extent to prevent the land auction; Party MLAs demand all party fact finding committee

title: Supreme Court refuses to entertain Mahua Moitra’s plea seeking transparency in financial markets
content: SC asks TMC MP Mahua Moitra to approach SEBI seeking public disclosure of norms for foreign portfolio investors and alternative investment funds

title: Karnataka cab and auto drivers welcome Centre’s ‘Sahkar Taxi’ initiative as State’s plan stalled
content: Currently, private entities own and operate ride-hailing applications, often retaining a significant portion of drivers’ earnings as commission

title: BJP MLA criticises Congress government in Karnataka for price rise, says 400 BJP leaders from Shivamogga will take part in protest in Bengaluru on April 2
content: Shivamogga MLA S.N. Channabasappa said the price of all services and commodities in Karnataka had increased since the Siddaramaiah-led Congress government came to power

title: 'Shocks our conscience': Supreme Court slams U.P. govt, development body over demolitions in Prayagraj
content: The court said the demolition action in Prayagraj did not follow the due legal procedure, adding that it sent a "shocking and wrong signal"

title: Kharge urges Centre to take up general census and caste census immediately
content: Mr. Kharge said that along with the general census, a caste census is also possible because the government already collected data on Scheduled Castes and Scheduled Tribes, it could collect data on other castes as well.

title: Supreme Court rejects Tushar Gandhi's plea against Sabarmati Ashram redevelopment project
content: Tushar Gandhi had filed a Public Interest Litigation (PIL) seeking a direction that the redevelopment be carried out under the aegis of the ‘National Gandhi Smarak Nidhi’

title: 18 killed, 5 injured after blast, blaze at firecracker godown in Gujarat’s Banaskantha
content: As per preliminary information, a blast at the factory led to a fire and collapse of parts of the building, leaving several persons trapped in the rubble

title: Controversial preacher Bajinder Singh sentenced to life for repeated rape
content: The court had, last week, convicted Bajinder guilty under section 376 and other sections, while the other five accused in the case were acquitted.

title: Kerala Opposition Leader accuses government of taxing people for its poor fiscal management
content: In a Facebook post, V.D. Satheesan describes LDF government’s new tax regime as ‘an April Fool’s Day hoax played on the public’

title: Odisha's Rath Yatra, Bali Yatra find place in Centre's intangible cultural heritage list
content: The Sangeet Natak Akademi has listed Odisha's Bali Yatra at number 45 and Rath Yatra, Puri, at number 54 in the list of Intangible Cultural Heritage of India on its website.

title: Mohanlal was aware of ‘L2: Empuraan’ story, only two minutes removed in re-edited version, says producer Antony Perumbavoor
content: On whether the makers agreed to carry out ‘voluntary’ cuts following ‘threats’ from right-wing elements, Antony says ‘it is our responsibility to make required corrections if the content hurt even a common man, but it was not following any threats’

title: ‘Offensive and strongly condemnable’: Assam CM Himanta slams Muhammad Yunus’s remarks on northeast
content: Mr. Sarma said the remark underscored the “persistent vulnerability narrative” associated with India’s strategic “Chicken’s Neck” corridor

title: Eight die in fire near a cracker manufacturing unit in West Bengal’s Pathar Pratima
content: There have been a number of similar incidents in West Bengal where cracker manufacturing units have caught fire leading to several deaths.

title: Teenager found hanging in police custody in Kerala’s Wayanad
content: 18-year-old found hanging in toilet of Kalpetta police station. He was taken into custody in connection with a minor girl’s missing case and was also reported missing days earlier

title: Kathua attacks: Combing operation underway after gunfire between hiding terrorists, security forces
content: Multi-agency operation resumes to track and eliminate militants hiding in forested area in Kathua after previous encounters

title: Waqf Bill: Kerala Catholic Church warns MPs ‘future generations will hold you accountable’
content: In editorial in Church’s official mouthpiece Deepika, it criticises Congress and CPI(M), suggesting that these parties may believe that certain communities’ votes are assured, while others need to be appeased periodically

title: Vanguard chooses Hyderabad to set up its first GCC in India
content: During a meeting with the firm’s leadership team, Chief Minister Revanth Reddy says his government is shaping Hyderabad into a GCC hub across domains, Vanguard’s endorsement will further strengthen our global positioning

title: Anand Mahindra appreciates Naidu’s ideas to promote Araku Coffee
content: Mr. Mahindra said it was inspiring to see Araku coffee earning the global recognition it deserves, and asked about incorporating design elements that celebrate its tribal roots

title: Forest areas encroached in 25 States, Union Territories; MP, Assam worst affected: Government report
content: Over 13,000 sq km of forest area under encroachment in India, with Madhya Pradesh having the highest encroachment.

title: 12 accused in 2020 Delhi riots acquitted
content: The judge also observed that a key prosecution witness did not identify the accused persons and made a “generalised statement, perhaps based on hearsay”.

title: ISRO’s CARTOSAT-3 images show damages caused by earthquake in Myanmar
content: ISRO’s CARTOSAT-3 imagery reveals earthquake damage in Mandalay and Sagaing cities, including collapsed landmarks and infrastructure.

title: Two drivers killed, four injured as goods trains operated by NTPC collide head-on in Jharkhand’s Sahebganj
content: The track is popularly known as NTPC Lalmatia MGR and the operation of which is not related to Indian Railways.

title: EAM Jaishankar meets Netherlands FM Caspar Veldkamp
content: During hs meeting with the Netherlands Foreign Minister Caspar Veldkamp, EAM Jaishankar discussed new possibilities in semiconductors

title: Extend deadline to apply for Rajiv Yuva Vikasam scheme to April 15: Telangana Deputy CM to officials
content: Telangana Deputy CM extends Rajiv Yuva Vikasam scheme deadline to April 14, offering financial aid to eligible youth.

title: Sunita Williams says India is amazing from space, ‘for sure going back to my father’s home country’
content: “I hope, and I think for sure, I’m gonna be going back to my father’s home country and visiting with people and getting excited about the first, or not the first, but the Indian national who’s going up on the Axiom Mission coming up, pretty awesome,” Sunita Williams said

title: India takes pride in Odisha’s history, literature and music: PM Modi
content: Celebrating Odisha’s culture and history on Utkala Dibasa, PM Modi praises the State’s achievements and progress.

title: CISF personnel traverse India’s coastal line to bond with communities to safeguard maritime interests
content: CISF personnel cycle 6,553 km along India’s coastline to empower local communities and enhance maritime security awareness

title: Andhra Pradesh notifies 51 mandals in six districts as drought affected
content: The impact has been severe in 37 mandals while 14 are moderately affected; Collectors told to take the necessary action to ensure credit facilities for farmers

title: Two ‘former students‘ arrested for rioting and attacking public servants at Kancha Gachibowli
content: Duo identified as ‘former students’ of UoH; police say mob, including UoH students, allegedly attacked officials and workers with sticks and stones, leaving a senior police officer injured

title: India charges 100% tariff on agricultural goods, time for reciprocity: White House on eve of April 2 deadline
content: President Trump plans to implement reciprocal tariffs on April 2 to combat high tariffs imposed by other countries.

title: More Indian women take up jobs, and still shoulder most household chores
content: While the share of women in paid work has risen, so too has the share of women involved in unpaid household work

title: Association of Catholic bishops seeks unbiased, constructive approach to Waqf Amendment Bill
content: It says certain provisions in the existing Central Waqf Act are inconsistent with the Constitution and the secular democratic values of the country

title: Northern Discom launches consumer feedback cell to enhance service quality
content: Key service parameters for consumer feedback are: timely release of new connections, behaviour of officials and staff, resolution of consumer complaints and prevention of corrupt practices

title: NTR Vaidya Seva: association seeks release of pending dues to network hospitals
content: Of the total pending dues of ₹3,500, only ₹300 crore has been cleared and the hospitals are in no position to continue delivering services to people, says Andhra Pradesh Speciality Hospital Association

title: Four children among seven killed in gas cylinder blast in Bengal
content: A probe would also be conducted to ascertain whether firecrackers were manufactured inside the house, another officer said

title: BMTC to operate special buses for IPL 2025 matches at Chinnaswamy Stadium
content: To accommodate the surge in demand, BMTC will deploy buses on multiple routes connecting key areas of the city with the stadium.

title: Eid in Bhopal marked by black bands against Waqf Bill, Palestine placards
content: At the Bhopal Idgah, several people sported black arm bands during the morning prayers against the Waqf Amendment Bill 2024, while videos on social media showed groups of people showcasing placards in support of Palestine.

title: Thinking beyond population count
content: The time has come to go beyond population size as the lone yardstick of allocation and determination of political representation

title: Bangladesh inviting China dangerous for Northeast region, says Congress
content: Pawan Khera shared a video clip of Bangladesh Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus where he claimed that Bangladesh is the guardian of the ocean (Bay of Bengal)

title: Ujjain, Omkareshwar, Maihar among Madhya Pradesh’s religious cities to face liquor ban from April 1
content: While announcing the ban, Mr. Yadav said his government has taken a historic step towards de-addiction and cited "public faith and religious reverence" associated with these cities and rural areas as reasons for the move

title: Ministers threaten Kunal Kamra over remarks on Eknath Shinde, alleges Sanjay Raut
content: Mr. Raut claimed that ‘Ministers in the State Cabinet are openly threatening Kunal Kamra, despite such lawlessness, Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis remains a mute spectator.’

title: Study reveals rainfall increase in Western Ghats over 800 years
content: Experts stress the importance of long-term environmental policies to mitigate risks from intensifying monsoon

title: Delhi High Court upholds disability pension order for two Army personnel
content: Court recalls former U.S. President Kennedy’s ‘stirring words’ on patriotism that while ‘we sip our hot cappuccinos by the fireplace, soldiers are braving icy winds at the border’

title: Ahead of SC hearing, Adivasi rights bodies, environmentalists ask Tribal Affairs Ministry to defend Forest Rights Act
content: Excessive reliance on satellite imagery, without abiding by the list of evidence provided in the FRA, had led to ‘wrongful denials of rightful claims’, the tribal rights bodies said

title: Panchakarma technician course launched at Snigdha Ayurvedic Hospital
content: Health Minister Satya Kumar Yadav inaugurates praises Ayurveda’s growth, and urges stronger government support

title: Two-day Congress session in Gujarat will seek to highlight the party’s ‘rich legacy’ in State
content: AICC session in Gujarat to highlight Congress legacy with CWC meeting at Sardar Patel memorial and Sabarmati Ashram visit

title: Contrary to regulations, SC/ST PG medical students pay up tuition fees, get no refund even after completing course
content: Affected doctors said when they raised the issue with their respective college administrations, they were told there was no official word from the DME on fee exemption/refund.

title: El Nino ruled out during monsoon this year: IMD
content: Before the monsoons kick in, however, India will be reeling in ‘above normal’ temperatures during the summer months; there could be more heatwave days this year, says the IMD

title: Ram Navami posters with pictures of Modi, Suvendu Adhikari surface in Kolkata on Id
content: This development follows a series of public statements by BJP leaders in West Bengal this month urging Hindus to come out in large numbers and celebrate Ram Navami on a large scale

title: NEP promotes Indianisation of education system, Sonia should support it: Fadnavis
content: Responding to Sonia Gandhi’s opinion piece titled, ‘The ‘3Cs’ that haunt Indian education today‘ published on The Hindu, Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis said the New Education Policy is all about Indianisation of Indian education system.

title: Opposition misleading Muslims on Waqf Bill: Rijiju
content: With the Centre likely to table the Amendment Bill on April 2, the Minister accused the Opposition of misleading ‘innocent Muslims’ by telling them that the government will ‘snatch’ their properties

title: Uttarakhand renames 18 places located in Haridwar, Dehradun, Nainital, Udham Singh Nagar districts
content: Chief Minister Pushkar Singh Dhami says the move is to respect public sentiment and preserve Indian culture and heritage

title: Parliamentary panel expresses concern over ‘chronic’ fund underutilisation by Tourism Ministry
content: Ministry used only ₹396 crore of the ₹2,479 crore allocated in 2024-25; Alarming statistics indicate deep-rooted systemic inefficiencies, says parliamentary committee in report submitted to Rajya Sabha

title: India-U.S. tri-service Ex Tiger Triumph to be held from April 1 to April 13
content: The exercise, involving Army, Navy, and Airforce forces of both countires, aims to enhance interoperability for conducting Humanitarian Assistance and Disaster Relief.

title: New e-pass system in the Nilgiris, Kodaikanal from today; confusion still reigns over its implementation
content: The system will remain in force till June 30.  The online link for travellers to register themselves for e-passes was unveiled on Monday. The High Court has mandated that vehicles using non-polluting fuels be given priority in the grant of e-passes
